Question: Changzhou Airwheel Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Changzhou Airwheel Technology Co., Ltd.

Smart Electric Unicycle

- Maximum speed of 18km/h and a range per maximum charge of 23km
- Incorporates fuzzy software, posture control, motion control, anti-electromagnetic interference, and a gyroscope
- Stylish, portable, and easy to use, weighing 9kg
- Alarm to signal when the speed exceeds 12km/h
- More than 200 franchise stores across China and flagship webstore on leading Chinese shopping websites
- Located in Changzhou National Hi-Tech District, supported by venture capital firms and municipal government
- Aims to produce more than 100,000 Airwheel scooters this year, anticipating sales exceeding CNY 200 million with R&D into manned aircraft
Summary_cn:
常州Airwheel科技有限公司

智能电动独轮车

- 最高时速18公里/小时，每次充满电最大续航里程23公里
- 采用模糊软件、姿势控制、动作控制、抗电磁干扰和陀螺仪技术
- 时尚、便携、易于使用，重量9公斤
- 警报提示超过12公里/小时的速度
- 在中国拥有200多家加盟店，并于中国主要购物网站开设旗舰店铺
- 位于常州国家高新区，受到风险投资公司和市政府的支持
- 目标是今年生产10万台Airwheel电动滑板车，并预计销售额将超过2亿元，还将进行有人驾驶飞行器的研发工作
